Greg Young wrote:
>
> I have been having some discussions lately with people about retries
> in a restful system and whether or not its appropriate for the caller
> to specify that it is a retry.
> 

If your protocol supports it, sure.  Otherwise, !REST, as REST is based
on the principle of generality -- not customized protocol hacking.

-Eric
